attributes.action: The People of the UK Demand a General Election Now
attributes.additional_details:
The current Government has repeatedly demonstrated an inability to govern:

It has:
	•	Failed to deliver on key promises made during the Brexit referendum.
	•	Misled the public on multiple occasions in its manifesto.eroding trust.
	•	Consistently made decisions contrary to the democratic will of the people.

This Government no longer holds a legitimate mandate. A general election is essential to restore democratic accountability and allow the public to decide who is fit to lead the country.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call on Parliament to urgently debate the need for a general election.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
